snippet.title: Slender Space | MARKIPLIER IS IN THE GAME
snippet.description:
If you enjoyed the video, please hit the LIKE button! It really helps!

Subscribe today for even more great videos: http://bit.ly/N9m47z

Like me on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/markiply
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/markiplier
Download Link: http://slenderspace.webs.com/

Hello everybody and welcome to my playthrough of the Indie Horror and newest Slender addition... SlenderSpace! In this game we explore the horrific combination of Slender and Dead Space! Why is Slender on this ship? Why are we alone with him? Why am I asking so many questions? Well watch the video to find out!

Livestreams: http://www.twitch.tv/markiplier
T-Shirts: http://markiplier.spreadshirt.com/

Outro Song: https://soundcloud.com/sukuninja/markipliergame-remix
